Text:
Thanks a lot.
Is there any chance to get it in French language ?

I just spent two minutes researching this, and this seems to be the original Moncrieff translation. If you want a seemingly well-founded opinion on the revision and why it was needed, you can read the "note on the translation" here: http://www.amazon.com/Modern-Library-Complete-Unabridged-ebook/dp/B006NKL8BQ/ref=sr_1_7?s=digital-text&ie=UTF8&qid=1338738562&sr=1-7
